  "scripts": {
    "build": "node build-orchestrator.js",
    "build:dev": "NODE_ENV=development node build-orchestrator.js",
    "build:prod": "NODE_ENV=production node build-orchestrator.js",
    "build:sequential": "node build-orchestrator.js --sequential",
    "build:verbose": "node build-orchestrator.js --verbose",
    "build:extension": "cd web-interface && npm run build:extension",
    "start": "./start-unified-system.sh",
    "start-ai": "node ai-router.js",
    "start-personalization": "./start-personalization-system.sh",
    "start-flash": "./start-flash-context-system.sh",
    "dev": "nodemon ai-router.js",
    "dev:full": "npm run build:dev && npm start",
    "oauth": "node oauth-server.js",
    "setup": "node setup.js",
    "test": "node test-connections.js",
    "test-ai": "node test-ai-router.js",
    "test:integration": "np...
configs.name: document-generator

scripts.test:integration: npm run test && cd web-interface && npm test

configs.content:
version: '3.8'

services:
  # Flask Backend - User Data Protected
  flask-backend:
    build: ./flask-backend
    container_name: document-generator-flask
    ports:
      - "5000:5000"
    environment:
      - FLASK_ENV=production
      - DATA_ISOLATION=enabled
      - PAYMENT_TRACKING=active
    volumes:
      # Isolated user data volumes (not shared with OSS)
      - user_uploads:/tmp/document-uploads
      - user_processing:/tmp/document-processing  
      - user_outputs:/tmp/document-outputs
    networks:
      - document-generator
    healthcheck:
      test: ["CMD", "curl", "-f", "http://localhost:5000/api/status"]
      interval: 30s
      timeout: 10s
      retries: 3
    restart: unless-stopped

  # PostgreSQL Database
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16-alpine
    container_name: document-generator-postgres
    environment:
      POSTGRES_USER: postgres
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres
      POSTGRES_DB: document_generator
    ports:
      - "5432:5432"
    volumes:
      - ...

# Document Generator Environment Configuration
# Basic working configuration - customize as needed

# =============================================================================
# GITHUB OAUTH
# =============================================================================
# Create OAuth app at: https://github.com/settings/developers
# Homepage URL: http://localhost:3000
# Callback URL: http://localhost:3000/auth/github/callback
GITHUB_CLIENT_ID=your-github-client-id-here
GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET=your-github-client-secret-here

# =============================================================================
# SYSTEM CONFIGURATION
# =============================================================================
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=3000
SESSION_SECRET=document-generator-dev-secret-change-in-production

# =============================================================================
# SECURITY SETTINGS (Optional - has working defaults)
# ====================================================...

# Document Generator Environment Configuration
# Copy this file to .env and fill in your actual values
# For detailed instructions, see API_KEYS.md

# ==================================================
# CORE CONFIGURATION
# ==================================================

# Application Settings
NODE_ENV=development
PORT=3000
API_PORT=3001
ANALYTICS_PORT=3002
PLATFORM_HUB_PORT=8080
WEBSOCKET_PORT=8081

# Application URLs (update for production)
APP_URL=http://localhost:3000
API_URL=http://localhost:3001
ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost:3000,http://localhost:8080

# ==================================================
# DATABASE CONFIGURATION
# ==================================================

# SQLite (Default - no configuration needed)
DATABASE_URL=sqlite:./data/document-generator.db

# PostgreSQL (Optional - uncomment if using PostgreSQL)
# DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@localhost:5432/document_generator
# POSTGRES_HOST=localhost
# POSTGRES_PORT=5432
# POSTGRES_DB=documen...

```bash
npm run desktop
```
